DataElement.preferredName: Eligibility Determination Estimate Begin Post Surgical Procedure Therapeutic Procedure Yes No Unknown Not Applicable
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether or not the patient is expected to start protocol therapy within the required post-surgery time frame.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Eligibility Determination Estimate Begin Post Surgical Procedure Therapeutic Procedure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures._To calculate approximately._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

Property.preferredName: Estimate Begin Post Surgical Procedure Therapeutic Procedure
Property.preferredDefinition: To calculate approximately.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 requested By Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership  transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/23/16 jk value "Not evaluable" added in error by COG on 3/21/16 was removed.
